articles.description: Jon Rahm skips ball across pond at Augusta National—on his birthday, no less
articles.content:
(Newser)
It's tradition for golfers to try to skip their ball across the pond before the 16th hole at Augusta National Golf Club during practice rounds, per ESPN. In doing so, Jon Rahm may have made… [+1331 chars]

articles.title: Dalvin Cook takes second straight NFC offensive player of the week - NBC Sports - NFL
articles.description: The Vikings season hasn’t played out as hoped in the standings, but running back Dalvin Cook isn’t the man to blame for that. Cook has scored at least one touchdown in every game he’s played this season and he added two more in last Sunday’s 34-20 win over th…
articles.content:
